column1: # Purpose: Master employee data containing personal information
# Central repository for all employee records and their organizational information.
# Used by agents for workflow validation
column2: including manager linkage for approval processes.

column1: # - UserID: Unique identifier for each user (u001
# - Name: Full name of the employee
# - Department: Department the employee belongs to (Finance
# - JobTitle: Current job title/position of the employee
# - Email: Primary email address for the employee
# - Manager: UserID of the employee's direct manager (used for agentic validation)
